turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a drink from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What is the location of the store you'd like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The store is on 1 International Place, Boston, MA, 02110

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, and what kind of drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a Cafe Americano

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any whipped cream or honey?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Honey would be good

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole should be fine

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything else with this order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So to confirm, you want one Cafe Americano, grande, with honey and whole milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, would you like to send this order in for pick up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been placed and a receipt will be sent to your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It should be ready for pick up shortly, have a nice day!
